result.eng: An underground train is called metro.
result.ga: Cuirtear meitreo ar thraein faoi thalamh
result.orig: Cuirtear meitreo ar thraein faoi thalamh
result.html: Cuirtear meitreo ar thraein faoi thalamhAn underground train is called metro.
result.ponchtml: Cuirtear meitreo ar ṫraein faoi ṫalaṁAn underground train is called metro.

result.ga: Cén t-ainm atá ar an bhaile sin
result.orig: Cén t-ainm atá ar an bhaile sin
result.html: Cén t-ainm atá ar an bhaile sinWhat is that town called?
result.ponchtml: Cén t-ainm atá ar an ḃaile sinWhat is that town called?

result.html: Ghlaoigh sí ar na gardaíShe called the police.
result.ponchtml: Ġlaoiġ sí ar na gardaíShe called the police.

result.eng: She lives in a suburb called Tallagh.
result.ga: Tá sí ina cónaí i mbruachbhaile darb ainm An Tamhlacht
result.orig: Tá sí ina cónaí i mbruachbhaile darb ainm An Tamhlacht
result.html: Tá sí ina cónaí i mbruachbhaile darb ainm An TamhlachtShe lives in a suburb called Tallagh.
result.ponchtml: Tá sí ina cónaí i mbruaċḃaile darb ainm An TaṁlaċtShe lives in a suburb called Tallagh.

result.eng: I live in a suburb called Kingston.
result.ga: Tá mé i mo chónaí i mbruachbhaile darb ainm Kingston
result.orig: Tá mé i mo chónaí i mbruachbhaile darb ainm Kingston
result.html: Tá mé i mo chónaí i mbruachbhaile darb ainm KingstonI live in a suburb called Kingston.
result.ponchtml: Tá mé i mo ċónaí i mbruaċḃaile darb ainm KingstonI live in a suburb called Kingston.

result.eng: "What's wrong with you?" called Norma-Jean when Rebekka chucked the bowl into the sink.
result.ga: Cad atá cearr leat a scairt Norma-Jean nuair a chaith Rebekka an babhla isteach sa doirteal de ráig
result.orig: Cad atá cearr leat a scairt Norma-Jean nuair a chaith Rebekka an babhla isteach sa doirteal de ráig
result.html: Cad atá cearr leat a scairt Norma-Jean nuair a chaith Rebekka an babhla isteach sa doirteal de ráig"What's wrong with you?" called Norma-Jean when Rebekka chucked the bowl into the sink.
result.ponchtml: Cad atá cearr leat a scairt Norma-Jean nuair a ċaiṫ Rebekka an baḃla isteaċ sa doirteal de ráig"What's wrong with you?" called Norma-Jean when Rebekka chucked the bowl into the sink.

result.eng: They live in a town called Sobotka.
result.ga: Tá siad ina gcónaí i mbaile darb ainm Sobotka
result.orig: Tá siad ina gcónaí i mbaile darb ainm Sobotka
result.html: Tá siad ina gcónaí i mbaile darb ainm SobotkaThey live in a town called Sobotka.
result.ponchtml: Tá siad ina gcónaí i mbaile darb ainm SobotkaThey live in a town called Sobotka.

result.html: Ghlaoigh sí ar a caraShe called to her friend. {shouted}
result.ponchtml: Ġlaoiġ sí ar a caraShe called to her friend. {shouted}

result.eng: At the top of her voice, she called:...
result.ga: I mbarr a gutha ghlaoigh sí
result.orig: I mbarr a gutha ghlaoigh sí
